seo.title: Environmental Complaints Received
seo.desc: Browse environmental complaints submitted on the platform.
header.title: Environmental Complaints
header.subtitle: Browse, filter, and follow complaints submitted by the community. This wall helps give visibility to environmental occurrences and speed up their resolution.
list.no_results: No complaints found with the applied filters.
card.react_error: Unable to register the action right now.

filters.help: Use filters to find complaints by country, county, or text.
filters.country.label: Country
filters.county.label: County
filters.search.label: Search
reply_right.title: Right of reply:
reply_right.text: Institutions mentioned can request the right of reply. To do so, use the {link} page after registration, attaching proof of institutional representation.
auth.modal.title: Log in to interact
auth.modal.msg: To like, dislike or report, please log in to your account.
